title: I'm Struggling to Feel Compassion Towards My Mom
description:
Katherine has had four stepfathers and says she's not interested in consoling her mother over her latest husband's death. - Dr. Laura: "It's reasonable to feel annoyed, but there's no benefit to acting annoyed."

How's your relationship with your mom? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
